item.title: 040-20240110-ExplorePhandalin
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log I don’t find Puss at the status so I go check out the well and find Puss on a rope checking out the bottom of the well.

item.title: 038-20231129-PostCragmaFight
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log After killing the ogre and goblin, we check out the bodies. We don’t find anything.

item.title: 033-20230927-PostRailLaunch
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log Fiona makes his way down to us. Only half of our rations survive We take a long rest we start foraging as we are trying to find our way out of the forest We continue in the direction where the rail tracks was following around the mountain we don’t really feel like we are finding our way out Aery turns into a tree, then chats with the trees around us.

item.title: 032-20230907-UndergroundPuzzles
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log Aeyr tries to pick up the hammer at the foot of the dwarven king skeleton.

item.title: 026-20230426-PostGuildFight
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session We kill all of the guild people except for one bureaucrat who runs into the cave.

item.title: 023-20230315-EscapingTheCave
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log We are working our way through the water passage in the cave We swim for a full day Fionea, puss, tia, don’t hear anything but Aeyr, Farquad hear screaming We surmize that they are hallucinating We take a third point of exhaustion We finally come out of the water passage and are at a small lake.

item.title: 022-20230301-FightWithHag
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session At our 4th day in the cave. Shit goes down, we break the statue, a woman comes out, Fiona yells HAG and starts blasting it.

item.title: 005-20220706-Goblin_Cave_Fight
item.description: Summary We defeat [[Clarg]] and offer him a clean death for information. He says that the only name he will give us is [[Cragma]] which we don’t know if it’s a place or a person.
